metadata.description:
"This is what i call REAL experimental music. Imagine Disco/Lounge beats meets Acid, mixed up to an epic tale. Andreas Seibel, who is well known in the netlabelscene as Dataman, is presenting his first Nights in Ural release on 2063. The Ural has a special role in Andreas life. He has no conscious memory on the Ural where he was born, but he uses this cold and sparse landscapes as a projection screen for his desires. This imaginative landscapes lead to a very visual and almost epic approach. "Nights in Ural is reflecting my desire for loneliness", he told me in a mail.
I explicit supported Andreas idea of making something strage with downbeats and 303 elements and i'm very curious about more things to come!"
020200
Andreas Seibel runs an netlabel himself called "LegoEgo" (http://www.legoego.de) and had various releases on stadtgruenlabel.net, comatronic.net und subsource.de and other vinyl-releases.
metadata.title: Nights in Ural - Geschichten der Heimat [63_054]
metadata.subject: Acid
